name: 2048 Save/Load Extended
description:
Have you ever found it frustrating when you spend an hours trying to reach the maximum tile, but

it finally turned out to be the failure every time you got very near to it!

It would be no more problem now with 2048 Save/Load Extended, the puzzle game that lets you go

back to the best spot anytime you got stuck, or see no promising to go on. And this is the time

that you can go as very far as you have never imagined before with the power of rebirth or

saving!

Try to get 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 16384,...,1073741824 !

2048 Save/Load Extended is an upgraded version of the current popular games of 2048.

HOW TO PLAY:
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they

merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins!

SUPPORT MORE PLAY MODES:
1. 3x3
2. 4x4 (default)
3. 5x5
4. 6x6
5. 8x8

HOW TO SAVE AND LOAD GAME:
Just tap on the Save button anytime you want to save the game,
And tap the Load button to continue the saved game.

No missing swipe, no wrong move, Just try 2048 Save/Load Extended
